response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and contribute to your success. Given its exceptional value and benefits, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $1,200,000. This offer is designed to provide you with substantial savings while ensuring you receive the full worth and quality of the product. I am confident that this investment will pay off handsomely for you in the long run. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information about the product. I look forward to the opportunity to serve you and help your business reach new heights.", "product_price": 1200000}
